sub_title: Senior Data Delivery Expert at ING
summary:
•	International work experience with teams spanning across multiple countries helped me bridge cultural differences, develop global solutions and thus helping me in my professional development.
•	Helping International clients in their Transformation Journeys(Digital or Functional) with my Functional and Project Management skills.
•	5+ years of experience in hiring, mentoring, and growing high performing engineering teams.
•	Product Owner with experience in Product Strategy, Delivery, Stakeholder Management, Backlog Management, Monitoring and People Management.
•	Expert in translating business requirements to small and understandable user stories for developers.
•	Strategically Driving complex business requirements while collaborating with International (multi-locational and culturally diverse) teams and departments to deliver quality solutions on time.
•	Overseeing and managing the complete software development life-cycle; defining, prioritizing, designing, building, and testing new features.
•	Certified Advanced Scrum Master (SAFe & PSM1) with 7+ Years of experience in working on the Agile Framework and using tools such as Azure DevOps, JIRA, Confluence, RTC, and HP ALM.
•	Customer Journey Expert with working experience in the Banking domain (Wholesale Banking), with full proficiency in Credit Risk Rating, Payments, SWIFT and Financial Markets Products.
•	Experienced DevOps Engineer with knowledge of CI/CD using tools Azure DevOps, AWS, Jira, Pega, Jenkins, GitHub, Terraform, Artifactory, Prometheus, Grafana and Docker.
•	Knowledge of different systems, middleware and interfaces used in the Wholesale Banking domain; Risk Rating, GBS, Streaming Platform, Murex, Calypso, Intellimatch, TIBCO.
•	A clear, articulate and effective communicator with constant drive to influence, develop and empower colleagues to achieve objectives as a team.

certifications.name: Financial Markets: A Beginners Module
certifications.authority: National Stock Exchange of India Limited

certifications.name: ITIL 2011 Foundation Certificate in IT Service Management

profile_positions.description:
- Helping the Risk Rating team in their Transformation journey to a new application which is microservice architecture based state of the art new IT application.
- Developing Program Vision and aligning the vision with stakeholders and senior management.
- Engaging stakeholders to understand high level functional requirements and keeping them informed  on the status of the Features.
- Working and collaborating with Engineers, Domain Architects and Technical Architects to develop functional and technical designs for complex problems.
- Breaking large solutions for Features into small parts and Creating, Refining  and Prioritizing User Stories in the Product Backlog.
- Working on and managing the IT Risk controls for the Risk Rating product.
- Developing and maintaining Project Governance, Communication, Roadmaps and Milestones.
- Collaborating with other Product Owners for Solving Dependencies and ensuring Efficient Delivery.
- Designing API structures/contracts for the flow of information from one microservice to the other.
- Working with the SRE team to define and create Azure YAML+ pipelines for quick, seamless and secure delivery of quality code on the DTAP environments.
- Organizing, Managing and Reporting the User Acceptance Testing (end to end) for the Risk Rating Product.
- Created a 1st line and 2nd line Support team, Trained the Operations team before the product go-live and created Detailed documentation for the features of the Risk Rating application.
- Initiated and worked on a PoC(Proof of Concept) for the analysis of development strategy and selection of technologies to be used for the data synchronization between the old and the new databases until all features are migrated to the new Risk Rating application.
- Motivated the team to use the latest technologies to build a scalable, fault tolerant and cloud based infrastructure which hosts a quick, secure, microservice based Risk Rating application.
profile_positions.title: Customer Journey Expert

profile_positions.description:
Product Owner: 
- Creating the product vision and roadmap considering the value for the consumer and the product as well as its role and impact.
- Identifying and solving dependencies with other product owners to ensure efficient delivery.
- Fostering strong relationships with key stakeholders to ensure that their views and requirements are captured in the product backlog.
- Keeping the stakeholders informed about the progress of the features and getting early feedback.
- Refining the product backlog by translating customer/business needs into Features and Stories to ensure that the product team is delivering the right features to drive consumer and business value.
- Prioritizing the items in the product backlog. Specifying the definition-of-done in cooperation with the product team.
- Accepting/Rejecting delivered backlog items by the team, in line with the definition-of-done.
- Monitoring, optimizing and enhancing the configuration, features and functionalities related to the product.
- Using sprint demos and retrospectives to ensure that the team is working on the right solutions.
- Guiding the development team towards the latest market trends and tools for enhancing automation, performance and quality of the product.
DevOps Engineer:
- Worked on transformation of DevOps team for the IGT department.
- Architecting and implementing a common Way of Working for all teams within IGT with tools like Azure DevOps (Backlog Management, Version Control and Pipelines), Artifactory(Binary Archival) and Docker Containers(Environment Management).
- Creating modular and re-usable CICD Pipelines(YAML) for Building, Testing and Releasing.
- Scripting in Python for the Automation needs of the Projects.
Migration Projects worked on:
- Version Control - RTC to Azure DevOps GIT Migration
- CICD Pipelines and Scheduler– ElectricFlow to Azure DevOps Pipelines
- Binaries Archival – Locally hosted shares to Jfrog Artifactory(Nuget Packages)
profile_positions.title: Product Owner & DevOps Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Business Analyst:
•	Requirements gathering, Analysis, Solution of Requirements and 2nd line support.
•	Creating solutions for changes in Payments, SWIFT Messages, Financial Markets instruments (Loans, Bonds, Bills, Repo) and Back Office Account Management.
•	GAP Analysis of the changes delivered from the GBS Vendor (WSS).
•	Creating and Driving End to End Solutions by Collaborating across teams (GBS, Streaming Platform, Murex, Calypso, TIBCO, Intellimatch) to deliver quality solutions and Regulatory changes on Payments & FM Products.
•	Worked as the Ops Engineer (2nd line support) for Payments and Financial Market transactions. 
Scrum Master:
o	Conducting the Daily Scrum, Sprint Planning, Backlog Refinement, Sprint Review, and Sprint Retrospective meetings.
o	Maintaining the Sprint Backlog on JIRA and Reports Log on Confluence.
o	Driving metric based continuous improvement and optimization of the flow of value.
o	Good experience in incident management, problem & change management. 
o	Creating the Burndown Chart, Team Velocity Chart, and Pie Chart report for the Sprint.
Major Projects in GBS:
•	Creation of APIs for PSD2
•	Virtual IBAN
•	EMIR (UTI) regulations on OTC derivatives.
•	Implementation of Automation Testing in GBS using HP-UFT
•	Creation of the CI/CD Pipeline for GBS
•	Negative Interest Implementation
•	SWIFT Regulatory Changes.
•	Regulatory reports creation for Central Banks (Analysis/Development/Test).
Migration projects handled as part of GBS:
•	Back-office Application Migration for FM products - Worked as a Business Analyst in the Migration of FM Products from GBS to MUREX(front office) and CALYPSO(back office).
•	Server Upgrade Migration - Migration Integrator in Migration of GBS Application with all Environments(working on Guardian Operating System) from HP Non-Stop Itanium servers to HP Non-Stop Blades servers.
•	Interface Migration – DevOps Engineer in Migration of Interface connection from SFTP-SSH to XFB.
profile_positions.title: GBS Solutions & Support - Business Analyst & Scrum Master

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities – 
•	Involved in Understanding Project Requirements, Test Scenario Preparation, Test Case Preparation of Functional and Technical Test Cases and Test Case Execution.
•	Preparation of Test Design, Results and Defect Documents and reporting of Defects on HP-ALM.
•	Created the Regression Test Cases for all modules to check the impact of a change on the other components of the system.
•	Regression Test Suite – Regularly run the scripts of Regression Test Suit to check the system. 
•	Updated General Test Scripts to make them reusable and easy to change by splitting the functionality in Functional Libraries.
•	HTML Reports – Created Reporting Script to generate HTML Reports rather than Doc reports.
•	Maintenance of Test Scripts and Regression Suite according to the changes in the ING Online Banking Application.
•	Manual Testing of RFCs which include changes in Domestic Payments, International Payments, Foreign Exchange, SECT, MECT, FTP, Database, Account and User Management.
•	HP ALM – Uploaded Test Scripts to ALM, linked QTP to ALM and ran the Test Cases from it.
profile_positions.title: ING Functional & Automation Test Team - Functional & Automation Tester

profile_positions.description:
TIBCO integrates GBS with all the other applications used by ING Bank, such as ING Online, Intellimatch and Streaming Platform. 
Responsibilities – 
•	Participated in product design meetings to learn requirements and design specifications.
•	Followed established development guidelines and standards to ensure continuity.
•	Involved in creation of Business processes using TIBCO BW like integrating GBS, Intellimatch, ING Online and Streaming Platform.
•	Developed the sample process flows, charts and sequence diagrams.
•	Deployed Web services in service registry.
•	Created Web Services and WSDL using event source and services pallets.
•	Used SOAP Spy to inspect the SOAP envelope.
•	Performed Unit and Integration testing of the developed TIBCO BW components.
profile_positions.title: TIBCO BW Development - Developer

profile_positions.description:
TCS Initial Learning Procedure(ILP) 
Responsibilities – 
•	Training at ILP (TCS Initial Learning Program) in Servlets, JSP, and SQL.
•	Case study project that required knowledge of HTML, JavaScript, CSS, JSP, Servlets and SQL.
•	Group/Technical Lead: Managed a team of six to review the case study, understand the requirements, develop and complete the project in quality before the end date.
profile_positions.title: Trainee
